name: Chronicles Of a Crystal Mage
description:
A story-based dungeon crawler game made in less than a month (mostly out of spite bc some people said that I couldn't)

Really really really advise you to play it whole before judging. Average playtime is like 10 minutes and can be fully played in web so, you know, if you like story-baed games maybe give it a shot (:

Also warning! a lot of text! proceed to game with caution!

If any of the 10000+ bugs will pop up on your playthru I would recommend try reloading (I'm sorry if you are playing in web tho)

Controls:

  • WASD to move + QE to rotate
  • SPACE to interact (important!!!)
  • Quit game on ESCAPE

Credits:

  • Code and art and music by ProstoCupOfTea
  • Beta-testing, beta-reading and moral support by Inkin (:
